channel.title: Need help
channel.description: i am a beginer at moparscape and i need help to know hot to go on a server with other people nad how to get items like santa and p hat thank you very much :confused:

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @archerer98 Archer
item.description:
@archerer98 wrote:

Well every server is different so nobody can tell you how to get things on every server but to play them download the moparscape 3.2 client in the server downloads forum and once its downloaded open it up type in a username and pass then go to the “help” tab on the client and shoose “server status” and pick a server thats on you want to play and type in the ip on your client where it asks for an ip.

Read full topic
